docs.text: Infrastructure as Code ¶ This repo contain the necessary Terraform scripts to build out the AWS infrastructure as outlined in my article, DevOps Automation and IaC Some of the code snipit is based on the following excellent work (thanks guys!) Hackernoon - Manage AWS VPC as Infrastructure as Code with Terraform Nick Carlton - Terraform: AWS VPC with Private and Public Subnets AWS Infrastructure Overview ¶ GIT Commands ¶ git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/bissessr/TF-IAC-2019.git git push -u origin master git add . git commit -m "Latest Updates" git push -u origin master More Information ¶ Checkout my other articles on Medium
